value.0:
The BlasTech Industries DL-44 heavy blaster pistol is a powerful sidearm created for the use in the currently raging Galactic Civil War.

It has found some use by the Rebel Alliance on account of its ability to consistently penetrate stormtrooper armor. It was outlawed by the Empire because of this. As a side effect, however, it has a somewhat slow rate of fire and uses about four times as much energy as a standard blaster, exhausting its magazine in about 50 shots. It weighs about 1.3 kg. A unique feature of the DL-44 is the vibration system built into the handgrip. A small stud in the grip begins to pulse gently to alert the user when the weapon's remaining energy is sufficient for five shots or fewer.

A blaster is a ranged weapon that fires bursts of particle beam energy called blaster bolts from a replaceable power cell. The most commonly used weapon in the Galaxy, blasters' intense beams consisting of compacted high-energy particles and intense light can kill or paralyze their target, depending on their setting.
